verses.verse: <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3254>another<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> and her <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
She <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H2175>Zimran,<s%> <S%H3370>Jokshan,<s%> <S%H4091>Medan,<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H3435>Ishbak,<s%> and <S%H7744>Shuah.<s%>

<S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> became the father of <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were <S%H805>Asshurim,<s%> <S%H3912>Letushim,<s%> and <S%H3817>Leummim.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> <S%H28>Abida,<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> All these were the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> all that he had to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%>

but to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4979>gifts.<s%> He sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> from <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> while he yet <S%H2416>lived,<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> to the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>
These are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H2416>life<s%> which he <S%H2425>lived:<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy-five<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>spirit,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age,<s%> an old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H622>years,<s%> and was gathered to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%>

the <S%H7704>field<s%> which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H6912>buried<s%> there with <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

It happened <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> Beer Lahai <S%H883>Roi.<s%>

Now this is the <S%H8435>history<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> bore to <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> by their <S%H8034>names,<s%> according to the <S%H8435>order<s%> of their <S%H1060>birth:<s%> the firstborn of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H5032>Nebaioth,<s%> then <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> <S%H110>Adbeel,<s%> <S%H4017>Mibsam,<s%>
<S%H4927>Mishma,<s%> <S%H1746>Dumah,<s%> <S%H4854>Massa,<s%>
<S%H2316>Hadad,<s%> <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> <S%H5305>Naphish,<s%> and <S%H6929>Kedemah.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and these are their <S%H8034>names,<s%> by their <S%H2691>villages,<s%> and by their <S%H2918>encampments:<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> according to their <S%H523>nations.<s%>

These are the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael:<s%> <S%H3967>one<s%> <S%H7970>hundred<s%> <S%H7651>thirty-seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> He gave up the <S%H1478>spirit<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

They <S%H7931>lived<s%> from <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> He <S%H5307>lived<s%> <S%H6440>opposite<s%> all his <S%H251>relatives.<s%>
This is the <S%H8435>history<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%> Abraham became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> of <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> <S%H269>Aram,<s%> the sister of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5227>for<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> because she was <S%H6135>barren.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> by <S%H7259>him,<s%> and Rebekah his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2029>conceived.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> struggled <S%H7533>together<s%> within <S%H7130>her.<s%> She <S%H559>said,<s%> "If it be <S%H2088>so,<s%> why do I live?" She <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8147>her,<s%> "Two <S%H1471>nations<s%> are in your <S%H990>womb.<s%> <S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H3816>peoples<s%> will be <S%H6504>separated<s%> from your <S%H4578>body.<s%> The one <S%H3816>people<s%> will be <S%H553>stronger<s%> than the other <S%H3816>people.<s%> The <S%H7227>elder<s%> will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H6810>younger.<s%>"
When her <S%H3117>days<s%> to be <S%H3205>delivered<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H8380>behold,<s%> there were twins in her <S%H990>womb.<s%>
The <S%H7223>first<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H132>red<s%> all <S%H8181>over,<s%> like a hairy <S%H155>garment.<s%> They <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H251>that,<s%> his brother <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>out,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> had <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H6119>heel.<s%> He <S%H7121>was<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when she bore <S%H3205>them.<s%>

The <S%H5288>boys<s%> <S%H1431>grew.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was a <S%H3045>skillful<s%> <S%H6718>hunter,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was a <S%H8535>quiet<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Now <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> because he <S%H6310>ate<s%> his <S%H6718>venison.<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2102>boiled<s%> <S%H5138>stew.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and he was <S%H5889>famished.<s%>

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "Please <S%H3938>feed<s%> me <S%H4480>with<s%> that <S%H122>same<s%> <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5889>stew,<s%> for I am famished." Therefore his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4376>"First,<s%> sell <S%H3117>me<s%> your <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>"
<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H4191>die.<s%> What good is the birthright to <S%H1062>me?<s%>"
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7650>"Swear<s%> to me <S%H3117>first.<s%>" He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H4376>him.<s%> He sold his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H5138>stew<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils.<s%> He <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went his <S%H3212>way.<s%> So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H959>despised<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>
